title: Google | L3 | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech from Tier-1 college.
Years of Experience: 2
Prior Experience: MAANG
Current compensation: 27 LPA(base 18.5)

Date of the Offer: July 2024
Company: Google
Title/Level: SWE 2/ L3
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 21,90,000
Signing Bonus: 3,00,000
Stock bonus: 47000 USD (38%, 32%, 20%, 10%)
Bonus: 3,28,500
PF: 1,05,120
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 44 LPA
Benefits: Standard google benefits
Other details: None


Generally in my current company people get promoted to sde-2 role after 2 yoe, i am still not lined up for promotion and i feel that it would take 6-9 months for my promotion to sde2 here.  After promotion compensation is 51 LPA here. what should i do now?

- Should i wait for my promotion in my current company?
- Join google and work from promo in google.

Any suggestion please ?

title: Salesforce | AMTS/SWE-1 | Compensation | offcampus
content:
Education: B.E. from Tier-1 College
Years of Experience: 0
Date of the Offer: july 2024 (offcampus)
Company: Salesforce
Title/Level: SDE-1 (AMTS)
Location: Hyderabad
Salary: 18L (Base)
Signing Bonus: 4L
Stock bonus: 25k usd(4 Years,25% each year)
Relocation Bonus: 60k
Annual Bonus: upto 1.8L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock) ~ 30L 1st year
Benefits: 3 time free food at the office & Standard Benefits

Other details:Had a oncampus offer as well from different company but chose salesforce.
